verbs.description: [ARG0: hawaiians] [V: advised] [ARG2: to monitor powerful hurricane hector two tropical storms formed in the pacific ocean off southwestern mexico but neither posed any immediate threat to land as they took tracks predicted to move parallel to the coast south point national hurricane center miami mexico central pacific hurricane center big island hurricane hector hawaiian islands]
